int max_sum = 0 ; void print_max_sum ( int arr [ ] [ 100 ] , int num_row , int cur_row , int sum , int cur_index ) { int sum1 = 0 , sum2 = 0 ; if ( cur_row == num_row && ( cur_index + 1 ) == cur_row ) { sum1 = sum + arr [ cur_row ] [ cur_index ] ; sum2 = sum + arr [ cur_row ] [ cur_index + 1 ] ; if ( sum1 > max_sum ) printf ( "%d
" , sum1 ) ; else if ( sum2 > max_sum ) printf ( "%d
" , sum2 ) ; else printf ( "%d
" , max_sum ) ; } else if ( cur_row == num_row ) { if ( ( cur_index + 1 ) <= cur_row ) { sum1 = sum + arr [ cur_row ] [ cur_index ] ; sum2 = sum + arr [ cur_row ] [ cur_index + 1 ] ; if ( sum1 > max_sum ) max_sum = sum1 ; else if ( sum2 > max_sum ) max_sum = sum2 ; } else { sum1 = sum + arr [ cur_row ] [ cur_index ] ; if ( sum1 > max_sum ) max_sum = sum1 ; } } else { if ( ( cur_index + 1 ) <= cur_row ) { sum1 = sum + arr [ cur_row ] [ cur_index ] ; sum2 = sum + arr [ cur_row ] [ cur_index + 1 ] ; print_max_sum ( arr , num_row , cur_row + 1 , sum1 , cur_index ) ; print_max_sum ( arr , num_row , cur_row + 1 , sum2 , cur_index + 1 ) ; } else { sum1 = sum + arr [ cur_row ] [ cur_index ] ; print_max_sum ( arr , num_row , cur_row + 1 , sum1 , cur_index ) ; } } } int main ( ) { int array [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int i , j , k , n , num_row , sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & num_row ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < num_row ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & array [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } } print_max_sum ( array , num_row , 0 , 0 , 0 ) ; } return 0 ; }
